statements.query: MATCH (n:APIUser)<-[:USES]-(:GCPAPI) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP API Gateway API User that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:APIUser)<-[r:USES]-(:GCPAPI) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP API Gateway API user to API relationships that are out of date

name: Cleanup GCP API Gateway API Policy Users
